title: Understanding Binge Drinking
text: Binge drinking is defined differently for men and women. It involves consuming a certain number of drinks on a single occasion.

title: Binge Drinking for Men
text: For men, binge drinking is defined as consuming five or more standard alcoholic drinks on one occasion.

title: Binge Drinking for Women
text: For women, binge drinking is defined as consuming four or more standard alcoholic drinks on one occasion.

hintAnswer: for men, drinking five or more standard alcoholic drinks on one occasion, and for women, this refers to drinking four or more standard drinks on one occasion
title: Identify the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following options correctly defines binge drinking?
choices: eight or more drinks per week for women and fifteen or more drinks per week for men or binge drinking on five or more of the previous thirty days
for men, drinking five or more standard alcoholic drinks on one occasion, and for women, this refers to drinking four or more standard drinks on one occasion
problematic behavioral or psychological changes (e.g., inappropriate sexual or aggressive behavior, mood lability, or impaired judgment) that develop during or shortly after alcohol ingestion
